attributes.title: Glitchy and Outdated 👎
attributes.review: For one, the app took forever to download onto my phone. I had to let it download overnight. Upon downloading, the app would open for a few seconds and then shut down. I was finally able to log in, only to have to struggle with the disorganized, outdated formatting of the app. One star for sure.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: There’s MILLIONS of words in the English language but I can’t find ANY to explain my HATE for this app. Literally I payed $50 for extra space on my phone, AND THIS APP TOOK 45 MINS TO DOWNLOAD!!!! Are you serious?? And my phone KEPT crashing as I open this app! I came to support the orange that runs this country- I mean man that runs this country, but was left disappointed.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 🤡🤡🤡🤡🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: When I got this app this ugly orange dude came up on my screen and said he will kill my poor children in my basement 😱😱😥😥😢😢😣😣😣 then I heard a knock on my door it was that orange 🍊 he killed all the kids in my basement 🤯🤯🤬🤬😠😠😡😡😢😢😭😭😤😤 and threatened to eat my mothers toes if I ever deleted this app don’t download it for your own safety 😢😣 review it a 1 star stay safe children in peoples basements

attributes.title: Worst App I’ve EVER Downloaded
attributes.review: This app is of the poorest quality... never opens when it’s supposed to. When it does randomly open, it causes super loud, obnoxious noises to come from my phone (many times at work, school, and even in the middle of the night). I would NOT recommend this app to anyone. The content is pretty ludicrous too, I must add.

attributes.title: apple how could you let this happen
attributes.review: I wanted a real app that would help me understand everything going on in the world so I turned to the official pres*dential app. Then I found a place where I could donate money to the continuation of our disgusting two party system, so I vomitted. Now that I have the app, I can’t open Tik Tok... what’s up with that?

attributes.title: this app killed my family
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and after 24 hours, it finally downloaded. then it started being suspicious and it crashed every time i opened it! ugh🙄💔 anyways then after a few days i got a text from trump himself because he hacked my info from this app and found my number💔 his text said: “you big smelly yucky bih. you will never be as rich and famous as me.” and then i came home from the liquor store and my family was dead. all of them. and there was a note taped to my door that said the exact same thing the text said.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: The app took four months to download. When I opened it, it immediately doxxed me. The very next day, the cops showed up and arrested every person of color in my city. They drop kicked me in the belly(I’m pregnant with quadruplets).They kidnapped me and brought me to a bunker in d.c. they’re not feeding us and they keep bringing us cats to attack our legs. Don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!🤬
attributes.review: I proceeded to download this app and I SOOON AS I OPEN IT BOOM!!! 💥 There’s a picture of this man who looks like a Cheeto, I thought this was to support Obama. I continue to work my way through the app and all of a sudden my phone is being taken over by hackers. I don’t know who this man is or what he wants from me, but I suggest not downloading it because it’s FAKE NEWS AND FALSE ADVERTISING 😌

attributes.title: Do not trust this app
attributes.review: This app is the nastiest app that I've ever used. DO NOT TRUST IT. It is worthless. My phone started glitching after I downloaded it. I started to power off more quickly and the volume would suddenly change while I would be listening to music. This app is abysmal and I would not recommend to anyone.
